DOC.brief_summary: Studies show acute bout aerobic exercise positively effect cognition , mainly executive functioning ; however effect observe among people clear whether aerobic exercise produce effect possibly also resistant exercise . The main purpose study examine whether genetic variation moderator effect whether resistant exercise comparable aerobic exercise improve cognition follow single bout exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Genetic Polymorphism Moderator Effect Acute Bout Exercise Cognitive Function
DOC.criteria: Physical Education Students Able sign consent form Competitive athletes Smokers Neurologic psychologic order Chronic disease Head Injuries Hospitalization previous 3 month Pregnant
